result.eng: They extended their hands as a sign of peace.
result.ga: Shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochána
result.orig: Shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochána

result.ponchtml: Ṡín siad a láṁa amaċ mar ċomarṫa síoċánaThey extended their hands as a sign of peace.
